articles.title: Karan Johar says he was ‘aroused’ by Animal, calls Ranbir Kapoor-starrer the ‘best’ film of 2023: ‘You can debate about the scenes, but…’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: For filmmaker Karan Johar, the Ranbir Kapoor-led Animal was the 'best' film of 2023. Karan said that the controversial film 'aroused and engaged' him like nothing else he watched last year.

articles.title: Actor Rakesh Bedi duped out of Rs 85,000 by scamster posing as Army officer - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Actor Rakesh Bedi was scammed out of Rs 85,000 by a conman posing as an Army officer. Oshiwara Police registered a complaint in the matter on December 30.
